game.name: 現風少女 フタリ一夜に騒がして
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Carve your own path through swirling bullet barrages! Face stages that seamlessly shift between 2D and 3D, using melee attacks to gain the upper hand. A bullet-hell shooter with a literally diagonal twist! What is the true nature of the stolen clock hand?
